description: Option A (Big Bear Runners): 2-mile warm-up + Drills + Strides + 4-6 x 200 meters at a Fun Fast Pace with a 200-meter walking recovery + 0.5-mile cool-down. Option B (Non-Big Bear Runners): 2-mile warm-up + Drills + Strides + 6-8 x 400 meters at mile pace with a 90-180 second recovery.

Option A: 12.5 minutes out at 10k pace, 10 minutes back at 5k pace + 4 x 300 meters at slightly faster than 5k pace with a 100-meter walking recovery. Option B: 5 minutes out at half marathon pace, 5 minutes back at half marathon pace + 4 x 100 meters at a Fun Fast pace with full recovery.
